Package LibTMOA.controllers

Class PIDController

  • java.lang.Object
    • LibTMOA.controllers.PIDController
  • public class PIDController
extends java.lang.Object
    A PID controller Class. This class was inspired by Arcrobotics PID Controller.

      • atSetPoint

        public boolean atSetPoint()
        Returns true if the error is within the percentage of the total input range, determined by setTolerance(double).
        Returns:
        Whether the error is within the acceptable bounds.
